Package oop.polymorph

Class AnnualVignette

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.polymorph.VignetteBase
      • oop.polymorph.AnnualVignette
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICanChangePlate
    public class AnnualVignette
extends VignetteBase
implements ICanChangePlate
    The AnnualVignette class represents an annual vignette, extending VignetteBase and implementing ICanChangePlate. It provides functionality specific to annual vignettes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields declared in class oop.polymorph.VignetteBase

        kfzType, plate, startDate

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      AnnualVignette​(java.util.Date startDate, java.lang.String kfzType, java.lang.String plate)
      Constructs an AnnualVignette object with the specified start date, vehicle type, and license plate number.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnnualVignette

        public AnnualVignette​(java.util.Date startDate,
                      java.lang.String kfzType,
                      java.lang.String plate)
        Constructs an AnnualVignette object with the specified start date, vehicle type, and license plate number.
        Parameters:
        startDate - The start date of the annual vignette.
        kfzType - The type of the vehicle.
        plate - The license plate number associated with the annual vignette.

    • Method Detail

      • validUntil

        public java.util.Date validUntil()
        Calculates and returns the date until which the annual vignette remains valid. The valid until date is set to one year from the start date, with the end time set to 23:59:59.
        Specified by:
        validUntil in class VignetteBase
        Returns:
        The date until which the annual vignette remains valid.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Checks whether the annual vignette is currently valid. The annual vignette is considered valid if it is not expired and the start date is before the current date.
        Specified by:
        isValid in class VignetteBase
        Returns:
        true if the annual vignette is currently valid, false otherwise.

      • changePlate

        public boolean changePlate​(java.lang.String newPlate)
        Changes the license plate number associated with the annual vignette.
        Specified by:
        changePlate in interface ICanChangePlate
        Parameters:
        newPlate - The new license plate number to set.
        Returns:
        true if the license plate number was successfully changed, false otherwise.
